abstract: Goldman Sachs waltzed Warren Buffett. Morgan Stanley tangoed with the Japanese. Bank of America got down with Merrill Lynch. But Vikram S. Pandit of Citigroup looks like the wallflower.
snippet: Goldman Sachs waltzed Warren Buffett. Morgan Stanley tangoed with the Japanese. Bank of America got down with Merrill Lynch. But Vikram S. Pandit of Citigroup looks like the wallflower.
lead_paragraph: “As long as the music is playing, you’ve got to get up and dance.”

headline.main: Seeking a Partner at the Dance
headline.print_headline: Seeking A Partner At the Dance
